name: Analytics SEO
slogan: Big Marketing Data & Tools for Professional Marketers
description:
Analytics SEO has re-branded - we're now Authoritas - please do visit the Authoritas profile (https://angel.co/authoritas-1) on Angel List so you can see our latest developments and vacancies!

Analytics SEO is a comprehensive cloud-based SEO platform focused on providing all the data, insights and recommendations a marketer needs to grow organic search engine traffic.  

Its integrated approach means the platform adds value for SEO, content marketing, social media and PR teams.  Built on a unique database of 25 million keywords, 100 million domains and 30 million blogs it provides clients with insights that help them achieve professional and personal success.

team.name: Laurence O'Toole
team.bioHtml: Founder @Analytics SEO and @Authoritas - Entrepreneur into Big Data Analytics, SEO and data-driven digital marketing.

team.title: Head of Growth
team.name: David Bain
team.bioHtml: Head of Marketing for Authoritas and Host of Digital Marketing Radio. 10+ years experience in growth hacking / entrepreneurial digital marketing.

jobs.title: Big Data Software Engineer
jobs.description:
We love working with Big Data!

Do you like working with Big Data?  Do you relish the challenge of analysing a whole industry and delivering insights to international clients.

We're looking for like-minded engineers who are also up for the challenge....do you fit the bill?

We try and do the impossible and then package it into our SaaS platform to deliver a level of market intelligence that our blue-chip international clients cannot get elsewhere!

This is a back-end role working with a bunch of extremely talented engineers.  You don't have to be customer facinig at all (unless you want to be).

We're on a quest to build a world-class team of exceptional software engineers who are dedicated to devising exceptional solutions to hairy Big Data challenges in the online marketing world.

We believe we can really stretch you to get the very best out of yourself with the nature of our projects.  So if you're entertaining the idea of a new career challenge in 2016/17 then get in touch!

We firmly believe in using the right tool for the job, so you will be exposed to Symfony, Doctrine, Python, Tornado, Java, Hadoop, Elastic Search, Graph Databases (Titan, Neo4J), Cassandra,Toku DB, whatever gets the job done properly!

We constantly try to improve ourselves and follow industry best practices, so code reviews, CI, automation and knowledge sharing sessions (every Thursday we have a lunch of wisdom) are all part of the picture.

You will be part of an integrated team, which means you will be responsible for your code right through to production and technical support. 

We're looking for someone who fits most of the following:
•	Experience with a modern PHP framework and MVC (Symfony 2 preferred)
•	Excellent PHP and Javascript OOP skills
•	Experience developing REST APIs
•	Experience in writing optimized SQL queries
•	TDD/BDD
•	Several years experience in customer-facing software development
•	Exposure to Big Data solutions: Cassandra, Elastic Search or Solr, Graph Databases, Spark and related technologies
•	Data Science - if you have experience working on data-science driven projects and machine learning then that's a definite advantage

Interested in finding out more about the company and career opportunities?

We offer excellent training (and will consider exceptional individuals from other industries), great perks, competitive salaries and equity participation!  You share in the value you create!

Most of all, we'll offer a great place to spend your working days, working with a talented bunch of people, having fun building a great business going after a huge global market!

Come and chat to us and show us the tricks up your sleeve!

skills: Machine Learning, Data Science, Python, Perl, R

jobs.title: Software Sales - BDMs & Inside Sales - Marketing Software
jobs.description:
We're looking for ambitious sales development professionals to join our UK, US and EU sales teams.  

We have entry-level and experienced sales positions - ideally suited to ambitious graduates with a background or keen interest in digital marketing or computer science with 2 to 5 years' commercial experience (if that’s been in a sales or marketing role for an agency or client-side then so much the better).

We’re a fast growing international SEO & digital marketing software business in Twickenham, South-west London (about 20-30 minutes train from London Waterloo) and we offer professional sales and marketing career development in an international business with great benefits.

Initially the focus will be on selling our SaaS based SEO & Content Marketing Software solution to leading Enterprise brands, Publishers and eCommerce sites in the UK and USA.

Working closely with our bi-lingual (English and French) marketing and client-success team you'll be responsible for:

* Building new sales pipeline by working warm leads as well as targeting selected strategic accounts
* Negotiating and closing new business deals with leading brands and their agencies
* Developing strategic relationships with channel partners and other resellers

We offer excellent training (and will consider exceptional individuals from other industries), great perks, competitive salaries, uncapped commission schemes and equity participation!

Most of all, we'll offer a great place to spend your working days, working with a talented bunch of people, having fun building a great business going after a huge global market!

We're looking for a broad spectrum of sales skills and experience from inside sales reps through to experienced BDMs. We do sell internationally so languages (especially French) is an advantage. So no matter what your current skill and experience level - if you like what we do then please get in touch.

jobs.title: UI/UX Developer/Designer - Own our Customer Experience
jobs.description:
This exciting new role has been recently created to help us scale our product development and engineering efforts to deliver the next generation of world-class online marketing tools.

We’re looking for someone with front-end development and UI/UX skills to own the Customer Experience.  Working closely with the Product Management team and the Engineering Team you will be responsible for creating an intuitive and pleasurable experience for our customers by defining and implementing the User Journey.

We’re looking for an enthusiastic self-starter who can seize the initiative and manage this pivotal pat of the SDLC.

The ideal candidate will have a great mix of technical coding skills across the full stack (with a bias for front-end) and creative design skills, with a burning desire to build a world-class application with an interface that balances great UI/UX with the depth of Big Data and insights we need to give to our clients.

Day-to-day tasks and projects will vary but might include:

•	Capturing user requirements and devising the User Journey
•	User Interface Design – mock-ups, prototyping, updating or producing new style guides
•	Acting as the design authority within the engineering team
•	Implementing your designs working in conjunction with the experienced front-end and back-end engineering team

Skills:
•	Front-end website or application development experience working on commercial websites
•	Excellent working knowledge of HTML, CSS, Javascript and JQuery
•	Working knowledge of at least one PHP framework (preferably Symfony 2)
•	Twitter Bootstrap
•	SASS, LESS
•	Responsive design
•	Experience with JSON RESTful API’s

• Working knowledge of at least one PHP framework (preferably Symfony 2)
• Twitter Bootstrap
• SASS, LESS
• Responsive design
• Experience with JSON RESTful API’s

jobs.title: French Speaking - SEO Technical Account Manager/Trainer
jobs.description:
Immediate start required for a full-time technical SEO Account Manager and Trainer - must have several years hands-on practical SEO experience.

On a day-to-day basis you will be responsible for:

•	Keeping our customers happy and driving customer advocacy
•	Managing accounts in France, UK and internationally as we grow the business
•	Providing online demonstrations and training of the Analytics SEO software
•	Managing key accounts and growing revenues through effective account strategies
•	Delivering professional services and training to our Enterprise clients


The ideal candidate will at the very least offer:  

Experience:

•	First hand experience of managing and optimising successful SEO campaigns for clients in an SEO agency or working client-side as part of a marketing team for a brand or ecommerce site
•	Good track record of account management and producing impressive levels of client satisfaction
•	Great working knowledge of SEO and digital marketing

Skills:

•	Very strong interpersonal skills
•	Must be highly computer literate – Excel, Word are essential
•	Knowledge of CSS & HTML
•	Some programming interest though not at all essential would be a bonus
•	A willingness to learn and share your knowledge

Education:

Ideally degree level education - good exam results in English and Maths are essential.

Compensation:
We offer a competitive salary and £10-£15K annual bonus scheme (paid quarterly) based on performance.  There is also the opportunity to participate in an employee share option scheme.
